title: Risen Academy and Risen Brisbane LAN teams searching for players (gold-diamond)
body:
Hey everyone.

Risen is searching for several players to compete in the upcoming QUT LOL tournament at the start of next month.
We are looking for a mid (platinum-diamond) and support (platinum-diamond) for the Risen Academy roster and ADC (gold-platinum) for the Risen Brisbane roster.
The only other prerequisite for both of these rosters is that you must have residence in Brisbane or closeby.

Both rosters will go on to compete in online tournaments after the QUT LAN's completion!

Here is the application form:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeQCDgX8sdztc7beqJ-21s571pOoqdNs3wIXojb_6O86m3JNQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

Thankyou!
